text: Barbara Ann "Bobbie" Battista (July 23, 1952 â€“ March 3, 2020) was an American journalist and a known newscaster on CNN. During her 20-year career with the cable news company, Battista wrote many programs on CNN, CNN Headline News, and CNN International. She died of cervical cancer on March 3, 2020 in Davenport, Iowa, at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cervical cancer Category:American television news anchors Category:Journalists from New Jersey
title: Bobbie Battista
